headline: Arista Networks Stock Tumbles in Late Trading After Reporting Earnings
summary: Arista Networks shares tumbled in extended trading Thursday as the cloud networking giant reported shrinking margins, despite profits that topped Wall Street’s expectations. The company also announced a four-for-one stock split.

headline: Arista Networks sees fourth-quarter revenue above estimates on steady demand
summary: Still, shares of the company were down 6% in extended trading, having surged 83% this year on the back of a surge in demand for artificial intelligence technologies.  Companies have ramped up investments in AI technologies which require heavy computing power, creating a spike in demand for data centers, which use Arista's products such as Ethernet switches and routers.  Arista has said it is benefiting from its enterprise customers refreshing networking systems as they expand data center capacity rapidly.

headline: Arista Stock Falls As Investors Mull Size Of Q3 Beat, Guidance Amid Big 2024 Gain
summary: Arista stock fell on the company's Q3 earnings report as investors mulled the size of the beat and guidance amid a big gain in 2024.

headline: Arista Networks (ANET) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Arista Networks (ANET) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 14.83% and 3.15%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Arista Networks: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Santa Clara, California-based company said it had net income of $2.33 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $2.40 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Arista Networks: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Santa Clara, California-based company said it had net income of $2.33 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $2.40 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: Arista Networks, Inc. Reports Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., November 07, 2024--Arista Networks, Inc. (NYSE: ANET), an industry leader in data-driven, client-to-cloud networking for large AI, data center, campus and routing environments, today announced financial results for its third quarter ended September 30, 2024.
